News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League rescheduled home match against Bromley on Tuesday
News.description:
The Daggers will be looking to get back to winning ways after their 2-1 home defeat to Guiseley AFC on Saturday.
 
Bromley currently sit in 11th place in the National League table after their 1-0 home defeat to Solihull Moors on Saturday.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 1-2 Guiseley
Southport 1-4 Daggers
Daggers 3-2 Chester
Tranmere 0-2 Daggers
North Ferriby 0-4 Daggers
 
Bromley
Bromley 1-1 Solihull Moors
Tranmere 2-2 Bromley
Bromley 1-0 Torquay
Bromley 3-1 Southport
Bromley 1-2 Welling

Team News
Frankie Raymond, Luke Guttridge and Luke Howell are all expected to miss out. Matt Robinson and Curtley Williams are still not available for the Daggers.
 
Previous Meetings
The two teams last met in September, where the Daggers ran out 3-1 winners thanks to goals from Whitely, Maguire-Drew and Hawkins.

Fixtures
There is five fixtures in the Vanarama National League on Tuesday. All 7:45pm KO.
Daggers v Bromley
Eastleigh v Macclesfield
North Ferriby v Lincoln
Tranmere v Boreham Wood
York v Gateshad

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
